name: Super Moonshot Adventure
description:
Super Moonshot Adventure is a submission to the 2020 Github Gameoff gamejam. Your goal is to get to the moon at all costs. Again. And again. And again.

ONLY WORKS IN CHROME OR EDGE CURRENTLY. Firefox and Safari have known issues due to this issue: https://itch.io/t/1028526/cross-origin-policies-for-webassembly
